name: Path T Stomach
title: Pathologic T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Intraluminal or intramural extension to esophagus and duodenum is classified by the depth of greatest invasion in any of these sites, including stomach.  
* For extension to esophagus or duodenum via serosa, assign T4b

**Note 2:**  Assign T2 If the diagnosis states linitis plastica and no other information regarding extension is available.  
* Linitis plastica is defined as diffuse involvement of the entire thickness of the stomach wall

**Note 3:**   Assign T4b for contiguous extension from the site of origin. Discontinuous involvement is coded in M (distant metastasis). 
* *Exception*: Assign T1 for implants within the stomach
